sentences.en: An ellipsis connector. Move its control point to change spacing.
sentences.cn: 一条省略号连接线. 移动它的控制点来更改间距.

sentences.en: Breaks words between lines and adds ellipsis if the text doesn't fit in the rectangle.
sentences.cn: 中断行间的词,并且如果文本不适合此矩形则添加省略号.

sentences.en: Chinese null subjects can be further distinguished as PRO and ellipsis subject.
sentences.cn: 主语空位可以进一步区分为句法层面的PRO和篇章层面的省略型空语类.

sentences.en: Click the ellipsis for the relationship expression and add the following logic to the relationship definition.
sentences.cn: 单击关系表达式的省略号，并向关系定义中添加如下逻辑。

sentences.en: Ellipsis is a very common grammatical phenomenon in English, especially in some particular situations.
sentences.cn: 省略是英语中常见的语法现象, 且以特定语境下的省略居多.

sentences.en: Genuine VP ellipsis construction does not exist in English.
sentences.cn: 英语中不存在真正的动词短语省略.

sentences.en: In place of this ellipsis , you'll have code to set several additional MajorFunction pointers.
sentences.cn: 代替这个省略号, 你要用一些代码来设置一些附加的主函数指示器.

sentences.en: In the next place, the thesis differentiate ellipsis and implicit.
sentences.cn: 其次, 区别了省略和隐含.

sentences.en: In this textbook we will tolerate a certain amount of ellipsis.
sentences.cn: 在这本书中我们允许一些简化.

sentences.en: Named and variadic parameters can be used in the same function, simply by placing the variadic ellipsis after the list of named parameters.
sentences.cn: 可以在同一个函数中同时使用命名参数和可变参数，只需要将可变参数的省略号放在命名参数列表之后。

sentences.en: Some views about ellipsis in General Archaic Chinese are put forward to discuss in this paper.
sentences.cn: 文中并片《古汉语通论》一书的省略说提出商榷的意见.

sentences.en: States that a function type does not have ellipsis parameter.
sentences.cn: 表示函数类型不带省略号参数.

sentences.en: The sentence ` He is dead and I alive'contains an ellipsis, ie of the word ` am '.
sentences.cn: 在Heisdead andI alive 一句中有一处省略, 即am这个词.

sentences.en: There are five types of cohesion: reference, substitution, ellipsis, conjunction and lexical cohesion.
sentences.cn: 衔接有五种类型: 指称 、 替代 、 省略 、 连接和词汇衔接.

sentences.en: There is an ellipsis of " that " in that sentence.
To browse to the location of the file, click the ellipsis button.
sentences.cn: 若要浏览文件的位置, 请单击省略号按钮.

sentences.en: Truncates text that does not fit in the rectangle and adds ellipsis.
sentences.cn: 截断无法放入矩形框的文本并添加省略号.

sentences.en: You no doubt noticed the ellipsis in the code above.
sentences.cn: 您一定注意到上述代码中的省略号。

trans.tran_en: when words are deliberately left out of a sentence, though the meaning can still be understood. For example, you may say ‘He’s leaving but I’m not’ instead of saying ‘He’s leaving but I’m not leaving.’
